objects.name: SideWinder APT Group Indicators of Compromise
objects.description:
# Summary

A recent Rewterz threat alert provides indicators of compromise related to SideWinder APT activity targeting Pakistani Government officials.

# Threat Type

- Malware, APT, Espionage

# Overview

Rewterz has published a threat alert providing indicators of compromise (IoCs) tied to the SideWinder APT group. The group is believed to be working in the interest of the Indian government, primarily targeting Pakistani and Chinese military and government entities. Their TTPs include targeting of Windows machines with weaponized Word documents and mobile phones with custom built applications. Their ultimate goal is information theft and espionage. These IoCs are specifically tied to activity targeting Pakistani Government officials via decoy NDC meeting documents. For more information, see the Rewterz alert in the Reference section.

# Indicators of Compromise

See the Reports section to the right for a list of indicators of compromise.

# Recommendations

- Ensure anti-virus software and associated files are up to date.
- Search for existing signs of the indicated IoCs in your environment.
- Consider blocking and or setting up detection for all URL and IP based IoCs.
- Keep applications and operating systems running at the current released patch level.
- Exercise caution with attachments and links in emails.

# Reference

- https://www.rewterz.com/rewterz-news/rewterz-threat-alert-sidewinder-apt-group
